Date of Joining.description: The date when the employee joined the company

Company Type.description: The type of the company where the employee works

value_dict.Service: The company is a service-based company
value_dict.Product: The company is a product-based company

WFH Setup Available.description: Whether the employee has a work from home setup

value_dict.No: The employee does not have a work from home setup
value_dict.Yes: The employee has a work from home setup

Designation.description: The designation or position of the employee in the company

value_dict.2.0: The employee holds a designation level of 2.0
value_dict.1.0: The employee holds a designation level of 1.0
value_dict.3.0: The employee holds a designation level of 3.0
value_dict.0.0: The employee holds a designation level of 0.0
value_dict.4.0: The employee holds a designation level of 4.0
value_dict.5.0: The employee holds a designation level of 5.0

Resource Allocation.description: The amount of resources allocated to the employee

Mental Fatigue Score.description: The score indicating the level of mental fatigue of the employee

Burn Rate.description: The rate at which an employee experiences burnout

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in employee well-being and productivity analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the employee, please predict the burn rate.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in employee mental health analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the employee, please predict the mental fatigue score.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted mental fatigue score is.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in resource management.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the employee, please predict the resource allocation.
